Implementation Checklist: ☐ Pixelated fonts loaded ☐ Images sharp (no blur) ☐ CSS box-shadow pixel borders ☐ Retro palette 16-32 colors ☐ Blocky layout ☐ No anti-aliasing ☐ Responsive pixel scaling
Design System Variables: --pixel-size: 4px; --font: pixel font; --border-style: pixel-shadow; --anti-alias: none; --color-palette: 16-32 max; --image-rendering: pixelated
AI Compatibility: Low — niche aesthetic; limited AI integration unless for retro-themed AI games
Performance Budget: LCP < 2.0s; Font load < 100ms; Image rendering: crisp-edges; Minimal JS
Accessibility Tier: A (pixel fonts can be hard to read at small sizes)
Best For (Product Types): Gaming, Indie Games, Retro Products, NFT Collections
Dark Mode CSS: color-scheme:dark; bg:#0A0A0A; pixel borders #FFF; retro palette on dark; crisp-edges

AI Prompt Keywords (Copy-Paste Ready): Design an AI-native interface optimized for conversational AI, streaming responses, agent workflows, and intelligent suggestions. Use: streaming text containers, thinking/loading indicators, confidence scores, source citations, token counters, context windows, tool-use visualization, human-in-the-loop controls.

Implementation Checklist: ☐ Streaming text display ☐ Thinking/loading states ☐ Confidence indicators ☐ Source citations linked ☐ Token usage visible ☐ Context window indicator ☐ Tool-use visualization ☐ Human-in-the-loop controls ☐ Error recovery flows
Design System Variables: --streaming-speed: 30-50ms per token; --thinking-indicator: pulse; --confidence-color: green-yellow-red; --citation-style: inline popover; --token-display: compact; --context-window: progress bar; --agent-status: active/idle/error
AI Compatibility: Essential — this is THE pattern for AI products; every AI interface should start here
Performance Budget: LCP < 1.5s; Streaming latency < 100ms; INP < 50ms; WebSocket/SSE required; Minimal layout shifts
Best For (Product Types): AI Chatbot, AI Agent, AI Copilot, Voice AI, AI Writing, AI Code Gen, Personal AI Assistant
